message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.MM 

This paper deals with unsupervised learning of CNNs for optical flow estimation, which is a computer vision problem. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also proposes a novel framework for guiding the CNN learning, which involves using proxy ground truth data and an image reconstruction loss. This suggests that the paper may also be relevant to sub-categories such as cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.RO (Robotics). Finally, the paper evaluates its approach on standard benchmark datasets, which indicates that it may also be relevant to cs.MM (Multimedia).
